episodes.title: First interview with an ex-staff person, meet "X"
episodes.description:
X prefers to keep the black screen up during this interview and she gives the reason for that, it's probably not what you're thinking! here she goes into detail about her life after Landmark and why she was drawn to the organisation - like a moth to a flame.

Now that the first one is done, I sense it's the first of many more, she has a lot to say.

episodes.title: Life After Landmark
episodes.description:
Hi, I'm Dale Dickins and I was "on staff" with Landmark Education and Landmark Education Corporation (when it transitioned). I was employed as Manager for the Assisting Program, Self Expression and Leadership registration, the Communication Curriculum I completed the Course Supervisor Program, was also the Participation Manager for (at the time) Australia's smallest "Centre" in Perth, Western Australia and I had a short stint as a Self Expression and Leadership Program Leader.

When I finally "completed" as a Staff person and left the company, I was left very confused and tormented for 18 years until I finally plucked up the courage to contact Chris Shelton who I'd been listening to regularly to make sense of my experience. Ex-Scientologists were speaking a language I understood and I soaked up all the information I could... astounded at the similarities. 

The ontological shift I've experienced since that interview is what has me create this channel. The intent is to create a (safe) space for people to speak, to realise they are not going crazy. Those questionable events did happen... and, Landmark is correct, airing what has been suppressed.... saying those things that can't be said... it really does work. 

If you have something to say about your experience with Landmark, please contact me, let's talk.
